heading: What is your sleep goal?
options: Staying asleep (or falling back asleep after waking)

heading: How frequently do you wake up in the middle of the night?
Rate your difficulty falling asleep in the past week.
Rate your difficulty staying asleep in the past week.
Rate your problems with waking up too early in the past week.
How satisfied/ dissatisfied are you with your sleep pattern in the last 2 weeks?
How noticeable to others do you think your sleep problem is in terms of impairing the quality of your life?
How worried/ distressed are you about your current sleep problem?
To what extent do you consider your sleep problem to interfere with your daily functioning (e.g. ability to function at work) in the last 2 weeks?
Sex and hormones impact how you sleep / What sex best describes you?
How long have you had your sleep problems?
Do you get stressed during the evening while thinking about having to go bed?
Do you wake up in the middle of the night and are kept awake by feelings of frustration, anxiety, or anger about waking up?
Does your mind race with thoughts while you’re in bed (e.g., thinking about a major event tomorrow, unfinished todos)?
When in bed, do you ever tell yourself that if you don’t get 7-8 hours of sleep tonight, you’ll be a wreck tomorrow?
